entry.title: Roxy
entry.summary:
Vendor: A Luv Beauty
Type: Faux Mink
Price: 10.00

Roxy 3D faux mink lashes 15mm adds length, volume, and seduction to any look, while still being lightweight for a comfortable wear. Reusable up to 25 wears.

Our Roxy handmade cruelty free lashes are made of Faux Mink.

entry.title: Dazzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: A Luv Beauty
Type: 3D Mink Lashes
Price: 10.00

3D Mink Lashes adds length and volume to any look, while still being lightweight for a comfortable wear. Reusable up to 25 wears.

13mm 

How to Use:

Step 1: Prepare your look, curl your lashes and if you are applying mascara do so before applying your false lashes.

Step 2: Once you're ready to apply your false lashes, carefully remove the lashes from the tray. Pull from the band of one end of the lash, never pulling on the lashes themselves.

Step 3: Hold the lash up to your eye to measure for sizing. If the lash is longer than your natural eye shape, trim the lash accordingly, cutting it from the inner or outer corner, which ever you prefer.

 Step 4: Place a thin layer of non-permanent glue on the band of the lash, allow it to dry for 30 seconds, then place the lash on top of your natural lash line.
